item.title: About Me
item.description: My name is David and i’m the author of this website / blog. Yeah, no shit sherlock. I am a passionate Software Engineer and Security enthusiast. I do enjoy trying out and poke around with different technologies and frameworks as well as develop my own random ideas. Some of these can be found at GitHub. Unfortunately I’m not as active as I once used to be. Family happens and priorities change I guess ðŸ˜‰
